title: Donâ€™t Blame Me
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:02.12] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[00:05.22] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[00:08.98] Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[00:12.09] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life
[00:17.60] I've been breakin' hearts a long time
[00:21.73] And, toyin' with them older guys
[00:25.26] Just playthings for me to use
[00:31.66] Something happened for the first time
[00:35.79] In the darkest little paradise
[00:39.02] Shakin', pacin', I just need you
[00:45.18] For you, I would cross the line
[00:49.68] I would waste my time
[00:53.16] I would lose my mind
[00:57.13] They say, she's gone too far this time
[01:00.43] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[01:03.24] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[01:07.57] Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[01:10.15] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life
[01:14.29] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[01:17.58] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[01:21.03] Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[01:24.56] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life
[01:28.50] My name is whatever you decide, and
[01:33.37] I'm just gonna call you mine
[01:35.68] I'm insane, but I'm your baby
[01:39.61] (Your baby)
[01:42.07] Echoes (echoes), of your name inside my mind
[01:46.10] Halo, hiding my obsession
[01:49.05] I once was poison ivy, but now I'm your daisy
[01:54.94] And baby, for you, I would fall from grace
[02:00.15] Just to touch your face
[02:03.47] If you walk away
[02:07.37] I'd beg you on my knees to stay
[02:10.64] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[02:13.57] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[02:17.57] Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[02:20.58] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life (yeah, ooh)
[02:24.94] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[02:27.83] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[02:31.68] Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[02:34.86] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life
[02:37.92] I get so high, oh!
[02:40.57] Every time you're, every time you're lovin' me
[02:44.02] You're lovin' me
[02:45.06] Trip of my life, oh!
[02:47.60] Every time you're, every time you're touchin' me
[02:50.97] You're touchin' me
[02:54.43] Every time you're, every time you're lovin' me
[02:59.86] Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[03:03.36] I'll be using for the rest of my life
[03:05.51] (Using for the rest of my life, oh!)
[03:09.49] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[03:12.03] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[03:15.02] (Doin' it right, no)
[03:16.57] Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[03:19.22] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life (oh-oh)
[03:23.23] Don't blame me, love made me crazy
[03:26.44] If it doesn't, you ain't doin' it right
[03:28.73] (You ain't doin' it right)
[03:29.89] Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[03:33.19] I'll be usin' (I'll be usin') for the rest of my life (oh, I'll be usin')
[03:36.49] I get so high, oh!
[03:38.56] Every time you're, every time you're lovin' me
[03:42.36] You're lovin' me
[03:43.73] Oh, Lord, save me, my drug is my baby
[03:47.34] I'll be usin' for the rest of my life
[03:49.02]
